about_the_game:
Introducing Emery
Emery is a feature rich, fast paced and gameplay focused 2D platformer! Players are able to create their very own Emery class charge bot, and explore mysterious worlds in their search to find and recharge other lost bots!

Feature Rich Platforming!
The basics are all here: walking, running and jumping. But there's more! Get downward faster with the Air Slam! Blast upward with the powerful Charge Jump! Climb walls upward with a Wall Jump, or drop down from platforms in the background with a Drop Jump!

Manage Your Battery!
Battery power is life! As a charge bot, Emery can create its own power, but you'll need to manage it! Pick up various weapons to strengthen your bot or use various expansion units to enhance how you travel! It takes battery power to use these abilities, but you can always take a moment to recharge!

Your Emery, Your Way
Emery can be customized in almost every way. Its eyes can be changed, decals can be added, and every body part can be painted! You can even choose the color of your bot's shields and lightning!
